SearchType.Name: planck_7
SearchType.Title: Browse Single PCCS Catalogs(TBD on the fly cutout for preview)

FieldGroup.Label:
For Planck data, map regions and beams will be downloaded.
LFI and HFI PSF files are multi-extension FITS files containing
the derived PSFs at the individual frequencies at the HEALPix pixel
closest to the input coordinates.

For Planck data, map regions and beams will be downloaded.

the derived PSFs at the individual frequencies at the HEALPix pixel
closest to the input coordinates.

For Planck data, the beams will be downloaded.

the derived PSFs at the individual frequencies at the HEALPix pixel
closest to the input coordinates.

closest to the input coordinates.

closest to the input coordinates.

SearchType.Name: planck_8
SearchType.Title: Multiple Frequency Cutout Visualization(DX11d Map with PCCS1 catalog)

DEGREE.Name: subsize
DEGREE.Title: Cutout Image Size
DEGREE.ShortDescription: Specifies the size of the desired image cutout. Cutout size range is 0.16-2.0 degree.

EnumString.Name: mapscale
EnumString.Title: Scale Planck Cutout Image to Band FWHM:
EnumString.ShortDescription: Specifies whether to return the Planck cutout images scaled with the band FWHM.

EnumString.Name: optBand
EnumString.Title: Select Catalogs
EnumString.ErrorDescription: Please select at least one catalogs

DEGREE.Name: radius
DEGREE.Title: Catalog Search Radius
DEGREE.ShortDescription: Enter the radius of the search, 0.01-5 degree
